index.name: Lenra
index.title: Optimize your app creation
index.description: Lenra is an open source framework to create your app using any language, and deploy it without any Ops scale, built on ethical values.

manifesto.name: Manifesto
manifesto.title: Green Tech is the new tech
manifesto.description: This should be the standard for anyone starting a digital project. Not because greenwashing is trending, but because climate change tells us it's time to act. Strongly. Here're some insights on how you act by choosing Lenra.
